attributes.action: Support Breeze Nightclubs License Appliction - Nottingham
attributes.additional_details:
Breeze Nightclub is based on Huntingdon Street, Nottingham and is currently awaiting a license from the Nottingham City Councils Licensing department. Please show your support for the requirement for another venue to be licensed in the City of Nottingham to provide varied music nights that currently have no outlet in the city.

Keep up to date with progress on our facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/breeze.nottingham.9?ref=ts

Thanks for signing

rejection.details: This is not a matter for central government.
